sp_rel_widget_clone.payload: other.sp-tagline-color { color: $sp-tagline-color; } @media (forced-colors: active) { .sp-search-heading { background-color: Canvas; } } #homepage-search { .aisearch { --classicsponlydonotuse--rem-multipy: 1.6; } } sp_instance_aistitle,short_description,search_application,search_results_configuration,disable_all_suggestions,placeholder,ai_search_source_filterfalsefalseHomepage Search[{"name":"typeahead_search","default_value":"{title: 'How can we help?', size: 'lg', color: 'default'}","section":"Presentation","label":"Typeahead Search","type":"string"}]truetruesp_widgetadmin2015-06-11 23:02:03200fbd96cb20020000f8d856634c9ca1152Homepage Search997387cb1bb63010aeed10ee034bcbc5globalsp_widget_200fbd96cb20020000f8d856634c9ca1admin2024-03-05 11:32:47

sys_update_version.name: sp_rel_widget_clone_d4df61d91b495e10aeed10ee034bcb75
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="NowSpace Homepage Search">94df61d91b495e10aeed10ee034bcb70</child><cloned>2024-10-03 23:02:34</cloned><last_validated>2024-10-03 23:02:34</last_validated><parent display_value="Homepage Search">200fbd96cb20020000f8d856634c9ca1</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>other</category><client_script/><controller_as/><css>.sp-tagline-color {
	color: $sp-tagline-color;
}

@media (forced-colors: active) {
  .sp-search-heading {
    background-color: Canvas;
  }
}

#homepage-search {
  .aisearch {
    --classicsponlydonotuse--rem-multipy: 1.6;
  }
}
  </css><data_table>sp_instance_ais</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list>title,short_description,search_application,search_results_configuration,disable_all_suggestions,placeholder,ai_search_source_filter</field_list><has_preview>false</has_preview><id/><internal>false</internal><link><![CDATA[function link() {
      var geckoRegex = /Gecko\/\d+/; // Remove forced-colors css for Gecko engine (Firefox) as they already handle it
      if (geckoRegex.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
        $('.sp-search-heading').removeClass('sp-search-heading');
      }
}]]></link><name>Homepage Search</name><option_schema>[{"name":"typeahead_search","default_value":"{title: 'How can we help?', size: 'lg', color: 'default'}","section":"Presentation","label":"Typeahead Search","type":"string"}]</option_schema><public>true</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[var aisEnabled = $sp.isAISearchEnabled();

if (aisEnabled)
	data.typeAheadSearch = $sp.getWidget('typeahead-search', options);
else
	data.typeAheadSearch = $sp.getWidget('typeahead-search', options.typeahead_search);]]></script><servicenow>true</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-06-11 23:02:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>200fbd96cb20020000f8d856634c9ca1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>152</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Homepage Search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">997387cb1bb63010aeed10ee034bcbc5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_200fbd96cb20020000f8d856634c9ca1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-05 11:32:47</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div id="homepage-search" class="hidden-xs wrapper-xl">
  <div class="wrapper-xl">
  	<h2 class="text-center text-4x m-b-lg sp-tagline-color sp-search-heading" ng-bind="options.title"></h2>
  	<div ng-if="options.short_description" class="text-center h4 m-b-lg sp-tagline-color" ng-bind="options.short_description"></div>
  	<sp-widget widget="data.typeAheadSearch"></sp-widget>
  </div>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rajat@pamtconsulting.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-10-03 23:02:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>d4df61d91b495e10aeed10ee034bcb75</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>94df61d91b495e10aeed10ee034bcb70</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NowSpace" source="x_pamtn_nowspace">41a691151bc55e10aeed10ee034bcb4a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NowSpace">41a691151bc55e10aeed10ee034bcb4a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_d4df61d91b495e10aeed10ee034bcb75</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>rajat@pamtconsulting.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-03 23:02:34</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>
